description:
Test your soil!

The Sunday Soil Test Kit provides easy-to-use tools, expert analysis, and science-backed guidance to grow a healthier lawn.

Soil is the foundation of a vibrant, green lawn. Our comprehensive soil test kit measures 15 essential metrics, including macro- and micronutrients, pH, organic matter, and cation exchange capacity. With precise insights into your soil's health, we can create a custom lawn plan that delivers the right nutrients and addresses any deficiencies, helping you grow the lawn you've always wanted.

Ready for a lawn plan now? All Sunday plans include a FREE soil test kit.

sections.kit_benefits:
Measures essential macro- and micronutrients, pH, organic matter, and cation exchange capacity for peak lawn health
Provides precise nutrient requirements for custom lawn plans
Expert analysis with support to address issues and deficiencies
Utilizes the trusted Mehlich III method for accurate, reliable soil analysis
Soil results and analysis available in your account within 3-4 weeks!
sections.kit_components:
Custom Soil Coring Tool: Easily collect soil samples from your lawn.
Sample Kraft Bag and ID Sticker: Securely store and label your soil sample.
Soil Test Box and Prepaid Shipping Label: Conveniently send your sample to our partner lab.
sections.instructions:
For best results, follow your soil test kit and analysis with a custom Sunday Lawn Plan designed to support your lawn’s nutrient needs.
Collect soil samples: Use the custom soil coring tool to collect 3-6 samples from different areas of your lawn, both front and back yard.
Prepare your sample: Mix the samples in your bag (or a mixing bowl!), remove rocks and debris, and place a portion of the mixed soil into the sample kraft bag.
Send your sample: Seal the bag, attach the ID sticker, and place the sample bag into the soil test box. Use the prepaid shipping label to send it to our partner lab.
Receive your results: Within 3-4 weeks after the lab receives your sample, you'll get an email with your detailed soil analysis and personalized recommendations.
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Yard Advisors:
What sets Sunday's soil test apart?
We combine advanced lab techniques with the leading standard for sustainable turfgrass analysis. Our kit includes user-friendly tools and clear, science-backed guidance. With Sunday, it's not just a soil test—it's innovative lawn care tailored to your lawn's needs.
What happens after I send in my soil test?
Our partner lab precisely analyzes your soil's composition. Then, Sunday experts interpret your results using the gold standard for sustainable turfgrass management. We'll email you your results along with personalized guidance to support your soil's health.
When will my results be available?
Results will be ready within 3-4 weeks after the soil lab receives your sample. If you have any questions about your results or timing, reach out to our Customer Service team.
What if this is my second soil test kit?
If you're an existing Sunday subscriber, your plan already includes a soil test. Want to retest your soil? No problem! When you submit a second test, your account and subsequent lawn plan shipments will be tailored to your most recent results. Tip: Take a screenshot of your initial soil test results before sending in your new sample.
Any state restrictions?
This kit is approved for use in all states.
